doctor.name: Dr. S.M. Atiqul Islam
doctor.workplace: Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. S.M. Atiqul Islam is a Physical Medicine Specialist in Bogra. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Physical Medicine). He is a Assistant Professor, Physical Medicine & Rehabilitation at Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra. Practicing hour of Dr. S.M. Atiqul Islam at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra is 2:30pm to 9pm (Sat, Sun, Mon & Tuesday).

chamber.address: House # 12/310, Thanthania Bus Stand, Sherpur Road, Bogura

He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra. Practicing hour of Dr. Monzur Ahmed at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra is 4pm to 7pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.info: Dr. Asif Rabbani is a Physical Medicine Specialist in Bogra. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Physical Medicine). He is a Assistant Registrar, Physical Medicine & Rehabilitation at Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Ibn Sina Diagnostic & Consultation Center, Bogra. Practicing hour of Dr. Asif Rabbani at Ibn Sina Diagnostic & Consultation Center, Bogra is 5pm to 7pm (Closed: Friday).
